name: Joseph
text: It is different for what we have seen so far.

name: Joseph
text: And you! why you have to charge in like that?

name: Joseph
text: I've told you to always at my back and yet...

name: Student
text: Hey Hey! Don't be so mad, we both got it back alive you see?

name: Joseph
text: You still have a long way to go.

name: Joseph
text: Don't let it end like this, at least for yourself.

name: Student
text: I... I got it okay? Mr. Joseph

name: Student
text: I will be more careful next time.

name: Joseph
text: Now let's see what inside this factory shall we?.
